title.rendered: New Walls of Books Store + Valentine’s Ideas

content.rendered:
Walls of Books, Commerce, GA

Greg Phillips, the Walls of Books franchise owner in Watkinsville, just opened his second store! It’s located about 30 minutes away from his current location in Commerce, GA. Our Walls of Books franchise crew was there this week helping sort and organize the inventory. It’s formerly known as the Book Stand of Northeast Georgia, and we are transforming this already great store by putting the Walls of Books systems in place.

 

Valentine’s Day Gifts

There are so many Valentine’s Day gift possibilities! Pick up a copy of Love Is All Around Georgia (less than $10!) to share with a child in your lfe, check out our new book selection, or get a Gottwals Books gift card.

excerpt.rendered: Greg Phillips, the Walls of Books franchise owner in Watkinsville, just opened his second store!
